summary: Insightful Information Technology Manager with 15+ years of IT leadership experience including oversight of infrastructure, application support/development and retail. Dedicated to customer satisfaction with focused delivery of technical solutions. Proven leader in directing operations, maintenance and support of complex systems. Develops creative retail and business solutions, leveraging diverse methodologies and delivering solutions for leading organizations. Broad experience in digital transformation and new market entries for companies with multiple brands and channels.

school.name: Aydin Adnan Menderes Anatolian High School

profile_positions.description:
Dyson is entering Turkey with direct sales model after years of distributor model. I had assigned to establish the company, all sales channels (wholesale, online, retail stores), warehouse and office and service centers, build the IT function in META Region and digital transformation of Dyson Turkey. Reporting to Turkey GM and EMEA Regional IT Director. 
 
And I have a strong influence on maintaining the knowledge of evolving trends in Global IT strategy and management and applies those to continuously refine the IT Strategic Planning process for Turkey and jointly aligning with the country and company strategy and goals. Additionally I am responsible to deliver the best in class projects on time, within the agreed acceptance criteria and budget for Turkish market.

Key Achievements
• SAP implementation for Turkey Market (6 months design, develop, implementation)
• Establishing SAP integrated payment solutions with fraud prevention systems (Adyen, Iyzico, Riskified)
• Integration of warehouse management system with Dyson SAP
• Setting up E-POS provider and integration between local acquires and UK teams
• Invoice digitalization (e-invoice, e-archive invoice and e-delivery)
Setting up EFT integrated POS solution for retail stores (Architecture, Agreement, Implementation)
• Foundation of META IT function in Turkey and Dubai offices.
• Retail store and Mall demo zone IT infrastructure implementation
• Best in class Service Center IT infrastructure implementation
• Active member of country management, proactively provide new business models/technologies to improve retail operation(online&offline), develop local policies in line with the global IT strategy
• Apply Agile working methodology through offshore and central project groups (Scrum Meetings, Jira, Sprint base planning and development)
• Design, develop, implement and coordinate systems, policies & procedures in line with the global IT strategy, working closely with the Group IT functions.
profile_positions.title: Country Information Technology Manager

profile_positions.description:
With the opening of H&M Sales operations in Turkey, I have been assigned as the Country IT Manager for the new market entry for H&M(and COS as second brand), build the IT team and manage all IT operations among the EU and Ethiopia production office, Turkey sales support office, warehouse and the shops.
In addition to the below mentioned responsibilities, I am responsible for managing the IT staff, handling the IT budget for all operations, vendor management (Diebold Nixdorf) of the shops that will be opened in Turkey.
Projects
• Opening of H&M Turkey Distribution Center – Infrastructure, Procurement
• Opening of H&M Turkey Support Office – Infrastructure, Building and Procurement
•POS (Diebold Nixdorf) and EFT(Ingenico) systems establishment.
• New Generation EFT-POS integration acc. to new regulation(700+ POS, backoffice shift, 5 mio $ Capex)
• All stores opening and operations projects within Turkey(70 stores with 2 brands)
• Online Store(SAP Hybris) and Warehouse Opening Turkey
• E-Invoice Archive Integration Stores and Online
• Finance First (SAP) Project;
• Migration of Store Network infrastructure from MPLS to cloud based VPN solution(70+ locations) to Turkish provider from global provider(5 mio € OPEX gain in 5 years)
profile_positions.title: Country IT Manager

profile_positions.description:
IT Europe Responsible
For more than 4 years, my main responsibility is to deliver the best service for internal applications used in H&M for the end users. In addition to my main responsibilities, I have created several software projects that become the main planning tools for the biggest H&M production offices in Turkey, Bangladesh and China(Café – Bistro).
I am the leader of a team of three in the production office and report directly to the Production office manager, IT Production Offices responsible in China and several coordinators in Sweden. 
I have experience in global project management (as the system operation responsible for global planning project) and problem management within the Turkey infrastructure.

Projects
I have been the responsible contact for business and IT for below mentioned projects.  
Cisco Unified Messaging Services for Production Offices
Bistro – H&M Global Production Offices Capacity Planning Application System Operation Responsible
Capacity Follow Up Application (Turkey, Bangladesh and China Production Offices)
System Design, Development, Administration
Price Project
IP Based Telephony Solution
profile_positions.title: IT Responsible
